# Canonical URL Verification for Blog Posts

## Summary
All blog posts have proper canonical URLs set based on their URL format:
- HTML version (`/blogs/slug.html`) → Canonical: `https://www.alertmend.io/blogs/slug.html`
- Non-HTML version (`/blog/slug`) → Canonical: `https://www.alertmend.io/blog/slug`

## Implementation Details

### 1. Static HTML Files (Generated by build-blog-html.js)
- **Location**: `dist/blogs/*.html` and `dist/blog/*/index.html`
- **HTML version**: Canonical URL = `https://www.alertmend.io/blogs/${slug}.html`
- **Non-HTML version**: Canonical URL = `https://www.alertmend.io/blog/${slug}`
- **Slug normalization**: All slugs are normalized (lowercase, hyphens) before generating HTML

### 2. React Router Component (BlogPostDetailPage.tsx)
- **Route**: `/blogs/:slug.html` and `/blog/:slug`
- **Logic**: 
  - Checks if `location.pathname.startsWith('/blogs/') && location.pathname.endsWith('.html')`
  - If true: Canonical = `/blogs/${post.slug}.html`
  - If false: Canonical = `/blog/${post.slug}`
- **Slug normalization**: Slug is normalized (underscores → hyphens, lowercase) before fetching blog post

### 3. SEO Component (SEO.tsx)
- **Normalization**: Removes trailing slashes, query parameters, and hash fragments
- **Domain**: Always uses `https://www.alertmend.io`
- **Format**: `https://www.alertmend.io${normalizedPath}`

## Examples

### Example 1: HTML Version
- **URL**: `/blogs/resolving-kubernetes-node-not-ready-error.html`
- **Canonical**: `https://www.alertmend.io/blogs/resolving-kubernetes-node-not-ready-error.html`

### Example 2: Non-HTML Version
- **URL**: `/blog/resolving-kubernetes-node-not-ready-error`
- **Canonical**: `https://www.alertmend.io/blog/resolving-kubernetes-node-not-ready-error`

### Example 3: URL with Variations (Underscores/Capitals)
- **URL**: `/blogs/Resolving_Kubernetes_Node_Not_Ready_Error.html`
- **Slug normalized**: `resolving-kubernetes-node-not-ready-error`
- **Canonical**: `https://www.alertmend.io/blogs/resolving-kubernetes-node-not-ready-error.html`

## Verification
All canonical URLs:
- ✅ Use the correct domain (`https://www.alertmend.io`)
- ✅ Match the URL format (HTML vs non-HTML)
- ✅ Use normalized slugs (lowercase, hyphens)
- ✅ Are properly formatted (no trailing slashes, query params, or hash)
